build_command: cp prisma/schema.production.prisma prisma/schema.prisma && echo '=== Prisma Schema Configuration ===' && grep -A 2 'datasource db' prisma/schema.prisma && echo '===================================' && npx prisma generate && echo '=== Generated Prisma Client Schema ===' && grep -A 2 'datasource db' node_modules/.prisma/client/schema.prisma && echo '======================================' && npm run build
start_command: npx prisma db push && npm start
